version_description: We fixed all the crashes that could occurs during editing

Brand new version of your favorite Video Editor ! More effects, more stickers, and more stability, with improved UX

Brand new set of ambiance sounds and songs to create stylish videos

New timeline to edit your videos easier !
Fixed a crash when using the Split feature on some clips
New feature: you can now preview the transitions you add to your project by tapping them

Small layout fix
Minor layout fixes
Fix some filters

Spring is here so is the new version of the Video Editor!
Thanks to your feedback we entirely redesigned our app to make it even more powerful, fast, and easy-to-use!
We have also shipped many bug fixes and performance improvements!
We'd love to hear your feedback so leave us a comment
With love,
The Video Editor Team
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Hey fellow creators, our final design improvement is now live. All our edition panels have been under the knife and are now smoother and smarter than ever.
In this version we also fix some bugs and improve the stability of the app.
Hope you enjoy it !

A couple of bug fixes and stability improvement to improve your experience.
Hope you will enjoy it!

New preview of your project even more intuitive !
Display your project in fullscreen mode.
You will also notice better performance and stability.
Enjoy !
